english.segment1: It doesn't take much. For my heart to break. And you have done it. For what's seems the millionth time
english.segment2: Whenever I hear. Of your saving grace. And how you gave your life. In exchange for mine
english.segment3: Sometimes I wonder why you even love me. And why you ever chose to call me child. Then I remember. It's by your sacrifice. I can say that. I am yours and you are mine
english.segment4: It doesn't take much. For me to shed a tear. And you have done so many things. To make me cry. Whenever I think. Of all that I've done wrong. And everything that you have done. To make it right
english.segment5: It doesn't take much. For my heart to break. And you have done it. For what's seems the millionth time
